resources.string: Hey I wanna play a game with you! Tap play and let\'s go!
Press the play button and follow the rules.
The value you entered is less than the value that I set. Try it again.
The value you entered is greater than the value that I set. Try it again.
Oh yeah! You did it! You guessed! Bravo!

Hey, dude! I generated a 4 digit value and encrypted it with your fingerprint. Are you cool with that? Try to guess. But in order to verify, I will need to make sure that you are you. I will check your fingerprint for verification. Don\'t cheat!
